text: En iraivane! Niccayamaka ni enakku aracatciyait tantu, kanavukalin vilakkankalaiyum enakku karruttantay; vanankalaiyum pumiyaiyum pataittavane! Im'maiyilum marumaiyilum niye en patukavalan; muslimaka (unakku murrilum valipattavanaka irukkum nilaiyil) ennai ni kaippararik kolvayaka! Innum nallatiyar kuttattil ennaic certtituvayaka!' (Enru avar pirarttittar)
